CLUE: Texans sometimes wear hats to hold ten of them
FOUND IN: Ten-gallon hat: A traditional wide-brimmed cowboy hat, colloquially associated with Texan culture; however, the phrase "hold ten" is metaphorical rather than literal, as hats cannot physically hold a number of items.
Enzyme: Proteins that act as biological catalysts, speeding up chemical reactions in cells without being consumed in the process.
Pseudonym - a fictitious name used instead of one's real name
Plastron (used in combination with cuirass, it covers the chest)
